data.message: before attacking trump think about how many of your fans are trump supporters!......

replies.message: Not me......
who cares!
So just because you're a fan, he doesn't get an opinion? GTFO.
Not what I said idiot!
That's right who the fuck cares, since when does Eminem care? The same way you like trump he hates him. He can say whatever the fuck he wants - he's eminem.

I dont hate Trump. And I Love Em each day more. If I start to dislike everyone who has a different oppinion, I would end being a lonely selfish bitch. Let Em be Em. He´s not you employed. He´s a free man. Who trully loves one, respects his freedom.
I like eminem too!.....
I dont Like Trump And I dont Like Hilary
Nothing new here.. Back in a day when he was dissing Bill Clinton, Clinton's supporters still bought his shit

Gisele Danon Em's a great writer, sure. But how you respect a guy who gets famous by calling people out with naughty names when he attack someone who became president callin' people out with naughty names? Thas messed up. Man, Em's said more "racist" and "homophobic" stuff than Trump, you don't take that seriously .. same deal.

Nathan Duff, here's the thing though.. Em isn't the presenident of the USA. He's not held to the same standards and never will be. Do you think people would care if Trump was saying/doing any of the stuff he gets shit for now if he weren't president? Yeah, it might be in the news every now and then but at the end of the day no one would care. It would just be another thing for the tabloids. Trump isn't just anyone. He's not a rapper who has built an alter ego known for being offensive. He represents our country. Can you imagine the outrage that would have ensued if any past president said something like "grab her by the pussy"? People are still holding him to the standards of a celebrity. He gets away with saying what he does because of the persona that he built before presidency. He isn't held to the standard of respect and class that a president should have.
It seemed like the "fuck trump" also implied "fuck his fans too", just a guess.
He's like the rest of the liberals....too damn dumb to know what liberals are about and their agenda. He needs to keep rapping cuz he don't know shit bout politics!  Typical dumbass
Fuck the fans. Superman wouldnt change in a phonebook for stan.

If you're a real Em fan you would know how little he cares about trump supporters from his most recently released track. But im guessing you didnt listen.  https://open.spotify.com/album/2mr6tc72GnDU2RJoLCQ1qX

"Run the faucet, I'mma dunk
A bunch of Trump supporters underwater
Snuck up on 'em in Ray-Bans in a gray van with a spray tan
It's a wrap, like an ACE bandage"
The less conservatives in hip hop the better

"Think how many of your fans are Trump supporters" 

😂😂😂

The irony is literally killing me
no one gives a shit what white nationalists think. You think Em supports that shit? lol
Fuck to trumposssss 😂😂
99 likes sorry snowflakes!
Fucks given

Yea we get it. Trumpflakes get all butthurt when a musician or a celeb speaks out against Trump. You do it to literally everyone. You come to their pages and bitch and moan and cry. Yah'll a bunch of offended nut jobs.
